parameter.name: DefaultConnection-Web.config Connection String
parameter.description: DefaultConnection Connection String used in web.config by the application to access the database.
parameter.defaultValue: Data Source=g-aideserver.database.windows.net; Initial Catalog = G-aideDataBase; Integrated Security = False; User ID = sponcho; Password=Beguinvdd123;Connect Timeout = 60; Encrypt=False;TrustServerCertificate=True;ApplicationIntent=ReadWrite;MultiSubnetFailover=False;
